TextBody:
Hello,

You can download the installer from the EPp server.
Included in the archive there is the remove-epp file.
This should be able to uninstall the epp client.


Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NBAWf:ref
Subject: EPP Client Uninstallation for Mac Devices    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NBAWf:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NBAWf:ref

Hello Andrei,

The client is unable to communicate with the server. Will this uninstaller work in this scenario?

Best Regards,
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #439613 - EPP Client Uninstallation for Mac Devices

TextBody:
Hello,

Yes, the epp client can be uninstalled even without connection to the server.
You just need to download the remove-epp file and run it on the computer.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Best Regards
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #439613 - EPP Client Uninstallation for Mac Devices

TextBody:
Hello,

You will need to execute the remove-epp file over the terminal to uninstall the Epp client.


Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector
